file_content.text: Looks like Vaylin sent her entire fleet.
Where's the Gravestone?
Odessen? I need a status report, now!
Vaylin caught us in dry dock.
Just installed the last of those new upgrades. Need a few minutes to recalibrate our systems.
Ground forces are holding the line until the Gravestone's up, but we're outnumbered and out gunned.
Hold tight, Bey'wan. Help is on the way.
We've got your back.
I'll grab the drop ship. I can do more damage if I slip behind enemy lines.
I specifically ordered this battle to end quickly.
The Alliance is showing unexpected resistance. We still have the advantage, but the price of victory will be high.
Then pay it! Arcann is here. Mother. Father. The Outlander... I will paint Odessen with their blood!
Vaylin caught us with our britches down.
Still installing the new upgrades. Gonna take a few minutes before we're in the air.
Soldiers are expendable, but protect the Gravestone at all costs. We can't win this battle without it.
Sacrifice troops if necessary.
A full-scale invasion is a desperate move.
Vaylin's getting reckless.
But if it works, she can wipe out the Alliance in one fell swoop.
Unless we beat her.
Then pay it! The Outlander and Father are here. I will paint Odessen with their blood!
You and Lana can lead the charge. I'll do more damage if I slip behind enemy lines.
